message: Let's divide fairly, I'll get a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This offer won't be as good in later rounds.
You were generous, I can be too. But I still want a bit more
Okay, let's split this evenly.  It's better than risking inflation eating away at the pot.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve a bit more
Time is running out, Alice!  This is a fair offer considering inflation is working against me.
Inflation is indeed working against you. I'll give you a bit more, but don't expect me to go much lower
Alice, we're running out of time! This is my final offer - take it or leave it.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I think you'll take this deal
